# ac-input-base



























































<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                             | Type      |
| ---------- | ---------- | --------------------------------------- | --------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | The HTML disabled mode.                 | `boolean` |
| `label`    | `label`    | The label text of the this input group. | `string`  |
| `name`     | `name`     | The native HTML field name.             | `string`  |
| `readonly` | `readonly` | Enable readonly.                        | `boolean` |
| `required` | `required` | The native HTML required mode.          | `boolean` |
| `type`     | `type`     | The type of the internal input.         | `string`  |
| `value`    | --         | The value of the internal input.        | `any`     |


## Events

| Event    | Detail | Description                                         |
| -------- | ------ | --------------------------------------------------- |
| `change` | any    | Fired when the value of the internal input changes. |
